biotools.summary: Compare control versus test mutations Input a single Genome Diff, and as many reference files as you like. Using the Genome Diff, this will apply all the mutations to the reference sequences, output is to a single file that includes all the references in the requested format.

bioschemas.name: gdtools_check
bioschemas.summary: Compare control versus test mutations Input a single Genome Diff, and as many reference files as you like. Using the Genome Diff, this will apply all the mutations to the reference sequences, output is to a single file that includes all the references in the requested format.
